caption: This photograph depicts a rural, natural landscape under a blue sky with scattered clouds. The foreground is lush with greenery, featuring an assortment of grasses and wildflowers, peaking in hues of yellow and dull reds. The middle ground shows a green cluster of low scrub and bushes, transitioning into an open space with sparse vegetation. The background consists of a large, softly rolling hill that dominates the scene, barren of trees and mostly covered in reddish-brown earth with some greenery. The overall scene gives an impression of a quiet, serene, and possibly windy environment typical of a high plain or steppe region. The lack of any human presence or man-made structures emphasizes the untouched, natural aspect of the landscape.
title: Untouched prairie grasses in foreground provide sharp contrast to the land behind, which has been "reclaimed" following strip-mining operations.
